==Story==
{{VO/Story
|character           = Aloy
|name                = Aloy

|vo_01_01_title      = Hello
|vo_01_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Hello.ogg
|vo_01_01_tx         = Aloy here. I don't know this world, but my arrows are sharp and my bow's ready. If your party needs help, I'll do what I can.

|vo_02_01_title      = Chat: Moving Out
|vo_02_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Chat - Moving Out.ogg
|vo_02_01_tx         = Come on. Enough standing around, let's keep moving.

|vo_02_02_title      = Chat: Help
|vo_02_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Chat - Help.ogg
|vo_02_02_tx         = Let's get going. There are people who need our help.

|vo_03_01_title      = When It Rains
|vo_03_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} When It Rains.ogg
|vo_03_01_tx         = Rain. One way to wash off the grime.

|vo_03_02_title      = After the Rain
|vo_03_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} After The Rain.ogg
|vo_03_02_tx         = Sky's running out of rain for now. Time to dry off.

|vo_03_03_title      = When It Snows
|vo_03_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} When It Snows.ogg
|vo_03_03_tx         = The world always seems quieter when it snows.

|vo_03_04_title      = When It's Windy
|vo_03_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} When It's Windy.ogg
|vo_03_04_tx         = Wind's kicking up again. Feels good to breathe it in.

|vo_03_05_title      = When the Wind Is Blowing
|vo_03_05_file       = VO_{language}{character} When The Wind Is Blowing.ogg
|vo_03_05_tx         = Wind is really whipping now. My face feels raw.

|vo_04_01_title      = Good Morning
|vo_04_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Morning.ogg
|vo_04_01_tx         = Morning. World's starting to stir again. Me too, I guess.

|vo_04_02_title      = Good Afternoon
|vo_04_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Afternoon.ogg
|vo_04_02_tx         = Day's half over, but we still have a lot to do.

|vo_04_03_title      = Good Evening
|vo_04_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Evening.ogg
|vo_04_03_tx         = Sunset. We'll be under the stars soon.

|vo_04_04_title      = Good Night
|vo_04_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Night.ogg
|vo_04_04_tx         = Night's here. Time to rest, unless we're going on by starlight.

|vo_05_01_title      = About {character}
|vo_05_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About {character}.ogg
|vo_05_01_tx         = I grew up an outcast, and it wasn't much fun. Even though I'm a stranger here, people are friendlier than the tribe that was supposed to raise me. It's... nice.

|vo_06_01_title      = About Us: Action
|vo_06_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Us - Action.ogg
|vo_06_01_tx         = Everything I do is in the service of life, not death. That's why I'm here with you.

|vo_06_02_title      = About Us: Oath
|vo_06_02_friendship = 6
|vo_06_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Us - Oath.ogg
|vo_06_02_tx         = An oath seems like a formality. But if you want mine, you've got it.

|vo_06_03_title      = About Us: Moving Forward
|vo_06_03_friendship = 6
|vo_06_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Us - Moving Forward.ogg
|vo_06_03_tx         = I'll do whatever it takes to finish this with you. I won't hesitate. I won't falter.

|vo_07_01_title      = Something to Share
|vo_07_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Something To Share.ogg
|vo_07_01_tx         = If I have to share something, it'll be my bow... in the service of people who need the help.

|vo_07_02_title      = Interesting Things
|vo_07_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Interesting Things.ogg
|vo_07_02_tx         = This land has a past full of secrets, just like my world. I'll uncover all of it, if I have enough time.

|vo_09_01_title      = More About {character}: I
|vo_09_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 01.ogg
|vo_09_01_tx         = I'm not much for talking about myself. The mission is what's important.

|vo_09_02_title      = More About {character}: II
|vo_09_02_friendship = 3
|vo_09_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 02.ogg
|vo_09_02_tx         = I never had parents. But a man named Rost raised me. He was stern, but kind and generous. And he trained me well. I miss him.

|vo_09_03_title      = More About {character}: III
|vo_09_03_friendship = 4
|vo_09_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 03.ogg
|vo_09_03_tx         = I spent my whole life looking for my mother and never found her, not really. But I found ancient messages from the woman I was... cloned from. It felt like she knew me. And how to inspire me.

|vo_09_04_title      = More About {character}: IV
|vo_09_04_friendship = 5
|vo_09_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 04.ogg
|vo_09_04_tx         = When I grew up, I didn't have any friends. Later in my travels, I made some. But I left that world before we could grow close. That's why I'm glad to have spent time with you.

|vo_09_05_title      = More About {character}: V
|vo_09_05_friendship = 6
|vo_09_05_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 05.ogg
|vo_09_05_tx         = Trust doesn't come easy for me, but I know I can trust you. You're a true friend, and I don't say that often.

|vo_10_01_title      = {character}'s Hobbies
|vo_10_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Hobbies.ogg
|vo_10_01_tx         = Not sure if I have a hobby, unless you count reading things from the past. So, history... I guess?

|vo_10_02_title      = {character}'s Troubles
|vo_10_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Troubles.ogg
|vo_10_02_tx         = One world needed saving. Now another. There's never time to rest.

|vo_10_03_title      = Favorite Food
|vo_10_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Favorite Food.ogg
|vo_10_03_tx         = I'm not picky. Anything's better than traveling on an empty stomach.

|vo_10_04_title      = Least Favorite Food
|vo_10_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Least Favorite Food.ogg
|vo_10_04_tx         = Had an Oseram stew once that was so thick you could pave a road with it. Ugh.

|vo_11_01_title      = Birthday
|vo_11_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Birthday.ogg
|vo_11_01_tx         = Never put much stock in birthdays. Where I come from, it's a time to celebrate your mother, not yourself. Even so, I wish you a, uh... happy day.

|vo_12_01_title      = Feelings About Ascension: Intro
|vo_12_01_ascension  = 1
|vo_12_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension -  01.ogg
|vo_12_01_tx         = All right. Feels like we're making progress, but we can't stop now.

|vo_12_02_title      = Feelings About Ascension: Building Up
|vo_12_02_ascension  = 2
|vo_12_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension -  02.ogg
|vo_12_02_tx         = Getting better. Getting stronger. Always a good thing.

|vo_12_03_title      = Feelings About Ascension: Climax
|vo_12_03_ascension  = 4
|vo_12_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension -  03.ogg
|vo_12_03_tx         = No matter how good a hunter you are, you can always get better. Never rest. Never stop learning.

|vo_12_04_title      = Feelings about Ascension: Conclusion
|vo_12_04_ascension  = 6
|vo_12_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension -  04.ogg
|vo_12_04_tx         = When we started out, you were just another stranger in a world I didn't understand. But after everything we've been through, I can say this for certain: My bow is yours, now and always.
}}
